archimate:Resource.name: Service Implementation Binder
archimate:Resource.documentation: This ABB provides any bindings required to the invoking services and other layers. For example, if this were a WSDL-based service, then the invoking services or Integration Layer component would require its service request converted or mapped to an underlying Service Component call. The aspect of converting the in-bound call leverage Method Input/Output Transformer ABB is the responsibility of this ABB.

properties.value: This ABB provides any bindings required to the invoking services and other layers. The aspect of converting the in-bound call leverage Method Input/Output Transformer ABB is the responsibility of this ABB.
